title: Remove last ZooKeeper methods from KafkaResources

body:
### Type of change

- Task

### Description

This PR removes the last traces of ZooKeeper from the `Kafkaresources` class along with the last rmeaining uses of these methods that should not be needed anymore.

### Checklist

- [x] Make sure all tests pass
Thanks, I have already changes to these classes, but I can do rebase :)
